company_name: The Garden of Naturalsolution Co., Ltd
product_highlights: Yeast Ferment Filtrate from Saccharomyces cerevisiae
notes: The Garden of Naturalsolution Co., Ltd is a Korean cosmetic ingredient manufacturer specializing in Yeast Ferment Filtrate derived from Saccharomyces cerevisiae fermentation. Their natural ingredient focus and Korean fermentation expertise deliver high-quality yeast actives with proven anti-aging benefits. Listed on UL Prospector platform for international sourcing. The yeast ferment provides skin vitality, supports microbiome balance, and offers rejuvenating effects. Suitable for natural and premium anti-aging formulations.
